title: ICE with `adt_const_params`, `rustc_attrs`: "encountered def-id with no parent"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: F-rustc_attrs
labels.description: Internal rustc attributes gated on the `#[rustc_attrs]` feature gate.

body:
This is my first time filing a bug, I hope it's a good one! The testcase is minimized from [`const-generics-str-demangling.rs`](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/7b4f48927dce585f747a58083b45ab62b9d73a53/tests/ui/symbol-names/const-generics-str-demangling.rs). That test does what it's supposed to with `-C symbol-mangling-version=v0`, but I get an ICE when compiling without those flags. ### Code ```Rust // rustc +nightly ice.rs #![feature(adt_const_params, rustc_attrs)] struct Str; #[rustc_symbol_name] impl Str<"\t\n"> {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (ff4b772f8 2023-03-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: ff4b772f805ec1e1c1bd7e189ab8d5a4e3a6ef13 commit-date: 2023-03-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output First line: ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_symbol_mangling/src/legacy.rs:38:21: finding type for DefId(0:6 ~ ice[2e3e]::{impl#0}), encountered def-id DefId(0:0 ~ ice[2e3e]) with no parent ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_symbol_mangling/src/legacy.rs:38:21: finding type for DefId(0:6 ~ ice[2e3e]::{impl#0}), encountered def-id DefId(0:0 ~ ice[2e3e]) with no parent thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/ff4b772f805ec1e1c1bd7e189ab8d5a4e3a6ef13/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7efdc30cd51a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hdf463920cb9883c6 at /rustc/ff4b772f805ec1e1c1bd7e189ab8d5a4e3a6ef13/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7efdc30cd51a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hb1af812137cf3f3c at /rustc/ff4b772f805ec1e1c1bd7e189ab8d5a4e3a6ef13/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7efdc30cd51a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h6b1baa3b67580720 at /rustc/ff4b772f805ec1e1c1bd7e189ab8d5a4e3a6ef13/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7efdc30cd51a -
